snippet: Major League Baseball barred the minor leaguer Cesar Carrillo for 100 games amid its investigation of Biogenesis, a South Florida clinic.
abstract: Major League Baseball suspends Detroit Tigers minor league pitcher Cesar Carrillo for 100 games amid its investigation of Biogenesis, South Florida anti-aging clinic that reportedly has provided players with performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball barred the minor leaguer Cesar Carrillo for 100 games amid its investigation of Biogenesis, a South Florida clinic.

headline.seo: Pitcher Said to Be Suspended for Ties to Anti-Aging Clinic
headline.main: Pitcher Is Said to Be Suspended for Ties to Anti-Aging Clinic
